applied.subject: Internship application - created
applied.body: You have applied for an internship at {organization}. You will be notified when the status of your application changes.

eligible.subject: Internship application - reviewed by FLAW
eligible.body: Your application for an internship at {organization} has been reviewed and approved by the department that handles internships at Faculty of Law, Comenius University in Bratislava. You will be notified when the status of your application changes.

accepted.subject: Internship application - accepted
accepted.body: Congratulations! Your application for an internship at {organization} has been accepted. Further details about the internship and the next steps will be shared with you shortly.

rejected.subject: Internship application - rejected
rejected.body: We regret to inform you that your application for an internship at {organization} has not been successful. Thank you for your interest, and we encourage you to apply again in the future.

admin.subject: Pending internship applications
admin.body: New internship application as {organization} waiting to be reviewed.

body.one: We would like to remind you that you have {count} application waiting to be reviewed.
body.other: We would like to remind you that you have {count} applications waiting to be reviewed.
